associatedItemIds.description: A list of alert IDs and incident IDs associated with the case

description.description: The user-defined description of the case
description.example: This is the description of the case.

findings.description: The investigation findings of the case

priority.description: The priority level of the case

relatedCaseIds.description: A list of the IDs for related cases

status.description:
The status of the case
The "Deleted" status is used by Case Management to signify that the case was deleted in the third-party ticketing system and syncing has stopped. Case Management does not delete the case.

holder.description: The current role of the owner of the case.

externalTicketId.description: The ID of the case in the external ticketing system.

externalTicketUpdatedDateTime.description: The date the external ticket was last updated in ISO 8601 format.

If-Match.description: Provide the ETag of the resource to be updated
